Sentencas: Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta (SFM) is a promising electrode material recently studied for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this work, Cr-tolerance of SFM has been systematically assessed.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Due to the presence of Sr at the A-site, SFM has been found to be vulnerable to Cr species that resulted from the metallic interconnects.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The main product of Cr-poisoning for SFM is SrCrO4 deposited on the SFM surface.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the Cr-poisoning mechanism of the SFM material has been evaluated both experimentally and thermodynamically.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To enhance Cr-tolerance of SFM, LaCoO3-delta-infiltrated SFM (LC@SFM) has been developed.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: LC hinders the direct contact of SFM with Cr species, and LC@SFM has significantly enhanced Cr-tolerance compared with SFM.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This study provides valuable guidance for the wide application of the SFM cathode in IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Evaluation of Cr-Tolerance of the Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-δ Cathode for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
